[[Image:Julian C. Bradfield.png|frame]]
'''Julian C. Bradfield''' is the founder of [[Tolklang]] and cofounder of [[Minas Tirith (Cambridge smial)|the Cambridge Tolkien Society]]. He was also editor of ''[[Quettar]]''. He is currently Reader in Computer Science at the [[wikipedia:University of Edinburgh|University of Edinburgh]].
